HOME.SUBTITLE: Mexico City Water Leak Report System
HOME.REPORTDESC: Thank you very much for your contribution to the city. If you want to make a water leak report, click here.
HOME.STATUSREPORT: If you have already made a report and want to know if the leak has already been fixed, click here.
HOME.THEPLATFORMDESC: If you want to know more information about this platform click here.

REPORT.TITLE: Make your leak report
REPORT.SUBTITLE: Thanks for making your report
REPORT.DESCRIPTION: To make your report, we need you to provide us with your first and last name, email, address of the leak, a reference to the address, your profession or what you did when you saw the leak, the report, and if you wish, you can also upload an image.
REPORT.PROTECCION: We will not share your email with any institution or dependency
REPORT.MAP: Use this map to help you locate the address of the leak.
REPORT.PROFESION: What were you doing when you spotted the leak?*

ESTADO.TITLE: Report Status
ESTADO.SUBTITLE: Consult your Report
ESTADO.DESCRIPTION: Please, enter your report number to see the current status of your request.

ADMIN.TITLE: Log in to your account
ADMIN.SUBTITLE: Welcome
ADMIN.DESCRIPTION: Enter the email and password with which you are registered in the system.

REPORTESACTIVOS.TITLE: Active Reports
REPORTESACTIVOS.SUBTITLE: Welcome
REPORTESACTIVOS.DESCRIPTION: To get into the report, please click on it.
REPORTESACTIVOS.REPORTE: Good evening, I want to report a leak I spotted near...

LISTA.TITLE: Total Reports
LISTA.SUBTITLE: List of all the reports made in the portal.
LISTA.DESCRIPTION: All reports done in the portal are on this list, the difference between the Reports tab is that the reports tab just includes the active reports.

GRAFICAS.TITLE: Graphics
GRAFICAS.SUBTITLE: First graph: types of persons that answered the report. Second graph: number of reports resolved
